bibl.title: The Cheirographon and the Privatization of Scribal Activity in Early Roman Oxyrhynchos.

series.title: Akten der Gesellschaft für griechische und hellenistische Rechtsgeschichte.

bibl.title: Symposion 2007. Vorträge zur griechischen und hellenistischen Rechtsgeschichte (Durham, 2.-6. September 2007). Papers on Greek and Hellenistic Legal History (Durham, September 2-6 2007)
bibl.author: YIFTACH-FIRANKO, Uri

bibl.note: The cheirographon is the documentation of a legal transaction in the format of a letter. Its author is the prospective debtor, its addressee the future creditor.
